name: Samagatari
description:
This is a incomplete concept for a game, not a real game.

In Samagatari, players assume the role of a young child named Kenji who possesses a vivid imagination and a strong will to protect his family. 

The game consists of two distinct states: 💤the dream world💤, where Kenji becomes a powerful samurai wielding a katana, and the 🏠real world🏠, where Kenji explores his dark house in search of items to help him face the nightmares that haunt his family. 

Controls:

Move - Arrows/WASD

Shift - Dash

Attacks - 1/2/3 - Aim and Left click 

Interact - E
